statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE business_id = 100 AND date >= '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM businesses WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE household_id = 123 AND business_id = 456 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE household_id = 101 AND business_id = 201 AND timestamp = '2023-01-15 10:00:00'
DELETE FROM Households WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe' AND location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM Business WHERE type = 'Retail' AND industry = 'Fashion';
